qas.question: What national disaster caused Beyonce to create the Survivor Foundation?

What did Beyonce and Rowland found in 2005?

answers.text: expanded to work with other charities

qas.question: What foundation did Beyoncé start after Hurricane Katrina?
How much money did Beyoncé contribute at the beginning of her Hurricane Katrina foundation?
What other hurricane did Beyoncé's foundation help with?

context: After <a0_0>Hurricane Katrina<a0_0/> in 2005, Beyoncé and Rowland founded <a3_0>the <a6_0>Survivor Foundation<a6_0/><a3_0/> to provide transitional housing for victims in the Houston area, to which Beyoncé contributed an initial <a4_0><a7_0>$<a1_0>250,000<a4_0/><a1_0/>.<a7_0/> The foundation has since <a5_0>expanded to work with other charities<a5_0/> in the city, and also provided relief following <a8_0>Hurricane <a2_0>Ike<a8_0/><a2_0/> three years later.
